research_problem.problem_statement: Predict overall survival time in days from tumor gene expression to identify high-risk patients earlier.

goals.description: Achieve at least 75% accuracy in survival prediction (classification proxy)

data_sources: tcga_brca_500samples_expr_survival.csv (500 breast cancer samples, ~20,000 gene expression features, target: survival_time_days; requires cleaning of negative or invalid values)
